channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: US President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. The BBC apologised to Trump last month, but rejected his demands for compensation and disagreed there was any
item.description: US President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. The BBC apologised to Trump last month, but rejected his demands for compensation and disagreed there was any

item.title: Authorities in the Philippines have told the BBC the two alleged gunmen travelled to the country between 1 and 28 November, following reports they visited to receive "military-style training". #BondiBeach #Australia #Philippines #News #BBCNews
item.description: Authorities in the Philippines have told the BBC the two alleged gunmen travelled to the country between 1 and 28 November, following reports they visited to receive "military-style training". #BondiBeach #Australia #Philippines #News #BBCNews

item.title: The victims of the Bondi Beach attack include a 10-year-old girl, a British-born rabbi, a retired police officer and a Holocaust survivor. Eight people remain in a critical condition in hospital. #Bondi #BondiBeach #Australia #News #BBCNews
item.description: The victims of the Bondi Beach attack include a 10-year-old girl, a British-born rabbi, a retired police officer and a Holocaust survivor. Eight people remain in a critical condition in hospital. #Bondi #BondiBeach #Australia #News #BBCNews

item.title: Boris Gurman, 69, and his wife Sofia, 61, courageously stepped in to try and protect others before being shot themselves, their family said in a statement. #Bondi #Australia #Sydney #BondiBeach #BBCNews

item.title: Across the world, desperate parents of sick or dying children are being exploited by online scam campaigns, the BBC World Service has discovered. We have identified 15 families who say they got little to nothing of the funds raised and often had no idea t

item.title: A manhunt is underway after two people died and nine others were wounded during a shooting which took place at Brown University, Rhode Island, last week. #BrownUniversity #RhodeIsland #Manhunt #CCTV #BBCNews

item.title: Paul Doyle, who drove into a crowd at Liverpool FC's Premier League victory parade in May, has been sentenced to 21 years and six months in prison. #Liverpool #LiverpoolFC #LiverpoolParade #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: Naveed Akram, the surviving alleged suspect in Sunday's mass shooting at Bondi Beach in Sydney, has been charged with 59 offences, including 15 counts of murder and one of committing a terrorist act, according to the New South Wales Police. #Bondi #BondiB
